actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of any fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat during a one-hundred-eighty-day period.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation into the United States of any fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat during a one-hundred-and-eighty-day period.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of any fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat during a one-hundred-eighty-day period.
